Three tracts written by Robert Boyle. Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
[1], 42, 21, 16 p.
Printed by W.H. for Ric. Davis, Oxford : 1671.
Each of the treatises has special t.p. and separate pagination. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library. Of the temperature of the subterraneall regions--Of the temperature of the submarine regions--Of the bottom of the sea.
